response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. If you're interested, I propose we discuss this further to ensure both parties are satisfied with the transaction.
